nodes.text: Mara Jade – By the Emperor's Hand 2

Mara Jade – By the Emperor's Hand 2 is the second issue of the Star Wars Legends comic book series Star Wars: Mara Jade – By the Emperor's Hand. It was written by Timothy Zahn and Michael A. Stackpole, illustrated by Carlos Ezquerra, and published on September 2, 1998 by Dark Horse Comics.

Under cover of an Imperial raid, Mara Jade infiltrates the headquarters of would-be Black Nebula overlord Dequc, and assassinates the criminal leader. But back on Imperial Center, she finds evidence that the person she shot was a stand-in, and that the real Dequc is still out there, and gunning for her!
